Text:
Thank you very much for your wonderful uploads. 

Please can you upload (If it possible)

1) Principles and Practices of Winemaking (Roger B. Boulton (Author), Vernon L. Singleton (Author), Linda F. Bisson (Author), Ralph E. Kunkee (Author)) 
Paperback: 618 pages
Publisher: Springer; Softcover reprint of hardcover 1st ed. 1996 edition (October 29, 2010)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1441951903
ISBN-13: 978-1441951908

2) Wine Analysis & Production (Bruce Zoecklein (Author), Kenneth C. Fugelsang (Author), Barry H. Gump (Author), Fred S. Nury (Author))
Hardcover: 621 pages
Publisher: Springer (December 1995)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 0834217015
ISBN-13: 978-0834217010


Thanks in advance !!!
Cheers !!!!
